column4: hi, I'm having issues with cyrus-sasl authentication. I'm following the tutorial at http://flurdy.com/docs/postfix/index.html#config-secure-auth
From what I can tell, whenever I tri to send mail using my client, postfix does not connect to saslauthd properly, ignoring the contents of /etc/postfix/sasl/smtpd.conf
I'm logging the mysql queries and they don't show up in the log
Please don't flood, use http://paste.ubuntu.com to paste, don't use Enter as punctuation.
